page.title: 21TV in 2011
page.content:
Watching TV is very popular and most houses have TVs but only a very few people don't have TV's. Everybody in our class has a TV and most people have more than one TV.

Class 6 did a survey to find out what was the schools favourite program

Class 1,2 and 5 like The Simpsons

Class J like WWE

Class L and 6 like Family Guy

How much does a TV licence cost?

The prices vary with time the licences currently costs £145.50 for colour for just black and white it costs £49.00

But for those that are registered blind it costs £24.50 for black and white and for colour it is £72.50

There are many different sorts of TVS like 3D TVS, LCD TVS and Flat Screen TVS

Written by Gary


Class 6 Gladehill
